dict.acceptation: 直截了当的；坦率的；明确的；

sent.orig: I thought you were rather an honest, straightforward person.
sent.trans: 我以为你是一个相当老实、正直的人。

sent.orig: We insist on your giving us a straightforward answer.
sent.trans: 我们一定要你们给我们一个直截了当的回答。

sent.orig: The extension to systems of more than two identical particles is quite straightforward.
sent.trans: 把上述结论推广到含有多于两个全同粒子的系统中去是十分容易的。

sent.orig: China in past comment has sought to portray the matter as a straightforward criminal case.
sent.trans: 在过去的言论中，中国努力将此事描述为一起简单的刑事案件。
